content: स्थायिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [स्था-णिनि] {@--1@} Standing, staying, being situated (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>). {@--2@} Enduring, continuing, lasting, abiding; शरीरं क्षणविध्वंसि कल्पांतस्थायिनो गुणाः <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls>; कतिपयदिवसस्थायिनी यौवनश्रीः <ls>Bh. 2. 82</ls>; <ls>Mv. 7. 15.</ls> {@--3@} Living, dwelling, remaining; <ls>Me. 23.</ls> {@--4@} Permanent, firm, steady, invariable, unchangeable. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} A lasting or permanent feeling; (see स्थायिभाव below); <ls>Śi. 2. 87.</ls> {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} Anything lasting, a permanent state or condition.
